Text: Thanks for this ! The only album I ever heard of Mike Plume Band was Steel Belted Radio, and I loved it! But, I've been unable to find it or any other of their stuff. I look forward to this one and any others of theirs that you can upload for us.

no prob and i have a favour to ask you  :)

I clicked on your name and see you have upped Gary O' - Strange Behavior (1984). Can you do a lossless (flac) upload? 

Would be much much appreciated as i have been looking for this for years.



kit
I'm afraid I don't know how. I've never done FLAC before, usually I convert FLAC files to MP3 so I can use them anywhere. Any help would be appreciated so I can do this album for you.

Drop me a line at Kitlope@gmail.com and we'll talk... I wish TPB had a pm system set up.

Thanks

Kit
